mapper.select: SELECT F.FEED_ID, U.USER_NICKNAME, (SELECT COUNT(FL.FEED_LIKE_ID) FROM TBL_FEED_LIKE FL WHERE F.FEED_ID = FL.FEED_ID) AS LIKE_CNT, FF.FEED_FILE_ID, FF.FEED_FILE_NAME, FF.FEED_UPLOAD_PATH, FF.FEED_UUID FROM TBL_FEED F JOIN TBL_USER U ON F.USER_ID = U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_FEED_FILE FF ON F.FEED_ID = FF.FEED_ID ORDER BY F.FEED_ID DESC
